summary: Personal config settings for Categorized Favorites Menu by favmenumodder.
descriptionHtml:
So I was bored tonight and I thought of messing around in Skyrim and this is what resulted from it. Pretty satisfied with it and thought maybe I could share it.

For this to work, you need to install the original mod by favmenumodder: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4862]Categorized Favorites Menu[/url]

To install my settings, just copy them in \"C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Interface\" or where you have Skyrim installed and replace when asked. Or use NMM, as far as I know, it should work fine with it. And always remember to backup your files.

Used the default interface, cause I got used to it and frankly I like it this way, and added some personal tweaks like: 

*splitting power into shouts, abilities and tools (for some of the most used mods)
*weapon section split into close combat, shields (I\'m aware it\'s not a weapon), staffs, long ranged and ammo for better selection
*armor split into apparel which basically just headgear, armor, gloves and boots with their variants; and accessories that should cover the rest like rings, amulets, cloaks etc

[color=red][b]I\'ll be updating this on past and future mods that spark my interest, also taking requests (optional)[/b][/color]

The main version will be for 4:3 (1600x1200) and 16:10 (1680x1050) resolutions and thanks to Coasty, the optional version is optimized for the 16:9 (1920x1080) resolutions. Choose only the main or optional version to install, otherwise one of them will be overwritten (both of them contain the same things, so you\'re not missing out on anything if you choose one or the other).

Provides support for various mods including:

[b][color=green]Version 4.0b:[/color][/b]

Apocalypse Spell Package by Enai Siaion (updated)
   - unfortunately the spell Daedric Armor can\'t be properly categorized and it will appear in the apparel section

[b][color=green]Version 4.0a:[/color][/b]

Added missing (dragonborn dlc) Black Books and Altar powers

[b][color=green]Version 4.0:[/color][/b]

Dragonborn Compatibility
Immersive Weapons by Hothtrooper44 and Ironman5000 (Updated)
Fixed some minor mispellings.
Removed obsolete mods that are using MCM now and don\'t require spells

*And many other weapon/armor mods containing spears, scythes and other poking things, armor sets containing cuirass, various jewellery, underwear etc

And like I said it was made from my personal taste, no need to be rude if you don\'t like it. 
[b][color=red]If any mistakes are found, let me know and I\'ll try to fix them as soon as I can.[/b][/color]
Enjoy!



Credits:
favmenumodder: for creating this awesome mod (Don\'t forget to [color=red]endorse him[/color] and say thank you)
Coasty: for the 1920x1080 revamped version
And everyone else who\'s mods I enjoy!
author: eSoDian
